title: The Who My Generation stencil font
content:
Does anyone know what font was used on the cover of The Who's My Generation album?

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140719050442im_/http:/typophile.com/files/thewho_6007.jpg)
author: dipthong

comments.content:
Hello  
Please check similar:  
 [http://www.whatfontis.com/Futura-Black-D-urw.font?text=THE%20WHO](http://web.archive.org/web/20140719050442/http:/www.whatfontis.com/Futura-Black-D-urw.font?text=THE%20WHO "http://www.whatfontis.com/Futura-Black-D-urw.font?text=THE%20WHO")  
Alex  
I found it using: [http://www.whatfontis.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20140719050442/http:/www.whatfontis.com/ "http://www.whatfontis.com") - Identify the font you are looking for!
That's the one - thanks Alex: I wasn't familiar with that site - will use it all the time now!
